text: Valérie Cornetet is a French General officer. From July 2022 to May 2023, she is the director-general of the Institut Polytechnique des Sciences Avancées (French private aerospace university). Cornetet graduated from the ENSTA Paris in 1990Valérie CORNETET née CARUSO and École Polytechnique in 2006. She started as Product Development Manager for Saint-Gobain. In 2011, she is nominated Head of Innovation Management and Intellectual Property for Siemens.Valérie CORNETET Then, she became Product Manager for Mov'eo, the INRETS and Sopemea. In 2020, he joined higher education as deputy head of Institut Polytechnique des Sciences Avancées.Nomination d'une nouvelle DGA à l'IPSA, école d'ingénieurs du Groupe IONIS In July 2020, she became head of the College. She quit her job on May 31st, 2023, replaced by Anne-Ségolène Abscheidt.L’IPSA prépare son avenir avec l’arrivée d’une nouvelle équipe de Direction == Bibliography == * Le futur de l'avion : Les prochains défis de l’industrie aéronautique, Ivry-sur-Seine, FYP Éditions, 2020, 160 p. (ISBN 978-2-36405-203-1) ==References== ==Further reading== * Académie nationale de l'air et de l'espace and Lucien Robineau, Les français du ciel, dictionnaire historique, Le Cherche midi, June 2005, 782 p.
